column4: I am a ubuntu newb, i have no idea how to install dwarf fortress.   i need dwarf fortress!
*if* the source has a configure script, then "./configure && make && sudo make install"  but it could use something other than autotools, so if there isnt one, say so
okay I don't know what "do" ./configure && make install means
in a terminal, go to the directory where you unpacked the source, and run "./configure && make && sudo make install"
Paragon missed the "make" step in there
leave off the quotes when you copy and paste it
to go to a directory i would just type it in and hit enter right?  then it says bash: the directory?
If I were new to windows I'd be lost too. :P
what do I do to go to a directory then?
I don't know what that means?
okay.  What do I do to run it then?
is there a "configure" file or not?
